instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1286: What is A1286? A1286 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2009 , Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2255, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2330, 820-2532, 820-2523, 820-2533, 820-2850, 820-2915, 820-3330..

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Mid 2012 - ASD EFI ERROR-Battery Not Sealed
threads.message:
Wanted an opinion from someone with more experience than I. New replacement battery from Amazon. Didn't buy the cheapest or most expensive. Good reviews.

I haven't experienced this problem directly yet - Battery (test 6) Sealed Battery Test is Failing. Battery test 1 Error condition test passes.

I assume this is a communication with smc to get this data thing so that only leaves the battery right?

Battery is charging ok. Previouse work history is tea spilled on the KB. No backlight. Solved by an SMC reset with external usb KB. Now the internal KB is working again, but battery had an X. Suprizingly no water damage on Motherboard. All is working well but running a little slow. All hardware sensors are reading within range.

Thanks and happy Friday.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Macbook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1286</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Mid 2012 - ASD EFI ERROR-Battery Not Sealed
threads.message: Normal for fake batteries, will not affect operation.
